You know what, you're absolutely right about communication being key. I think I've been making this more complicated in my head than it needs to be. 

I'm actually feeling pretty good about having both conversations now. The exclusivity one feels less scary when I think about all the signs you pointed out that they're probably feeling the same way. And maybe being more open about the physical stuff will happen naturally once we talk about where we're headed.

I really appreciate you taking the time to help me think through all this. You've been so understanding and helpful, even when I was asking pretty personal questions. It means a lot to have someone to talk to about this stuff who doesn't make me feel weird or judged about it.

I think I'm going to try to bring up the exclusivity conversation this weekend when we're hanging out. And I'll definitely check out those resources you mentioned - it sounds like they'd be really helpful for understanding this stuff better.

Thanks again for all the advice. You've really helped me feel more confident about navigating this relationship!

<END>
